actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution referring S. 558 entitled, "A Bill for the relief of Retired Sergeant First Class James D. Benoit, Wan Sook Benoit, and the estate of David Benoit, and for other purposes," to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report on the bill.

summary.text: Refers S. 558 (a bill for the relief of two named individuals and an individual's estate) to the chief judge of the U.S. Court of Federal Claims for a report.

titles.title: A resolution referring S. 558 entitled, "A Bill for the relief of Retired Sergeant First Class James D. Benoit, Wan Sook Benoit, and the estate of David Benoit, and for other purposes," to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report on the bill.
